column4: Microsoft sells patents to Xiaomi  builds 'long-term partnership'
column5: SINGAPORE Software maker Microsoft Corp  is selling about 1 500 of its patents to Chinese device maker Xiaomi [XTC.UL]  a rare departure for the U.S. company and part of what the two companies say is the start of a long-term partnership.

column4: Microsoft sells patents to Xiaomi  builds "long-term partnership"
column5: SINGAPORE Software maker Microsoft Corp  is selling about 1 500 of its patents to Chinese device maker Xiaomi  a rare departure for the U.S. company and part of what the two companies say is the start of a long-term partnership.

column4: Microsoft sells patents to Xiaomi  builds "long-term partnership"
column5: SINGAPORE  June 1 Software maker Microsoft Corp  is selling about 1 500 of its patents to Chinese device maker Xiaomi  a rare departure for the U.S. company and part of what the two companies say is the start of a long-term partnership.
